venue.address_1: 45 South Main St., Suite 100, West Hartford, CT 06107
venue.name: Wu Healing Center

item.description:
This is a special workshop formulated to expand the the heart in this new time on earth. We will start with tea ceremony practicing liquid meditation drinking tea that is a tonic for the heart. We will then practice simple standing Qi Gong energy exercises to open up the energy in our bodies deeper. Next we will do some chanting expanding our vibration with sound.We will close with a healing circle in the seated position. The main modality used will be Tong Ren Therapy for the healing circle. This therapy will be accompanied by a combination of gongs, singing bowls, crystals, aromatherapy, and energy healing. This beautiful experience will help you access profound inner wisdom and integrate that knowledge to become more empowered and fulfilled in your heart and life.

Â 

Contact Erik at www.chiforhealing.com or 860-593-8397 to register today for $25. cost will be $30 at the door.
item.name: Nourish the open heart workshop
